Authors:
A Manoj Kumar, Mary Catherine Aime, K. B. Vrinda, C K
Pradeep
Title:
Two new species and a new record of Crepidotus
(Agaricomycetes) from India
Abstract:
Three species of Crepidotus, C. exilis sp. nov., C.
gyrosporus sp. nov., and C. croceotinctus are presented based on
morphological and molecular (nrLSU) studies from Kerala State, India.
These species are completely described and illustrated. Maximum
Likelihood analysis based on nuclear ribosomal large subunit rDNA
sequences are provided.
